title: BC登录服无法跳转子服
author: dssdfsfgfgf
txt_content:
本帖最后由 dssdfsfgfgf 于 2020-6-11 09:13 编辑 
子服 cat端 cat已启用bungeecord

跳转时提示  Kicked whilst connecting to Mods: Outdated client! Please use {0}

bc中已启用forge-support

附上bc config 


<font style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">prevent_proxy_connections: false
listeners:
- query_port: 25577
  motd: |
    &b&l❁&b&lZero 零 &b&l❁ &b&l▏&e&l■&6&l■ &4&lVer 1.12.2&6&l■&e&l■QQ群：99999999&b&l❁

  query_enabled: false
  proxy_protocol: false
  forced_hosts:

  ping_passthrough: false
  priorities:
  - lobby
  bind_local_address: true
  host: 0.0.0.0:33008
  max_players: 30000
  tab_size: 60
  force_default_server: false
remote_ping_cache: -1
network_compression_threshold: 256
permissions:
  default:
  - bungeecord.command.server
log_pings: true
connection_throttle_limit: 3
server_connect_timeout: 5000
timeout: 30000
player_limit: -1
ip_forward: true
groups:

  - admin
remote_ping_timeout: 5000
connection_throttle: 4000
log_commands: false
stats: 4df70396-ca90-4505-be9e-37238b8e518a
online_mode: false
forge_support: true
disabled_commands:
- disabledcommandhere
servers:
  lobby:
    address: 127.0.0.1:43008
    restricted: false
    motd: |
      &b&l❁&b&lZero 零 &b&l❁ &b&l▏&e&l■&6&l■ &4&lVer 1.12.2&6&l■&e&l■QQ群：999999999&b&l❁

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
这个提示 Outdated client!
应该是提醒你客户端和服务端的版本不对
但是放在mod跨服中的话
可能意味着不仅仅是这个问题

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
...?
你的配置发全了吗
还有mod端跨服用waterfall
https://ci.destroystokyo.com/job/waterfall/

replies.author: lzh5598
replies.txt_content:
这里有个问题，你使用的客户端是否含有Forge。
之前有出现过无Forge的客户端进入没mod的Cat端，出现无法进入的情况

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
直接连Mods服务器能进吗?
不要通过BC
可能需要暂时把mods服务器的server.properties里面的serverip调整为0.0.0.0
